name: Recipe: Cassoulet
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Cassoulet.

customize.name: Sausage
customize.desc: Finely minced meat wrapped in a skin. A staple of every meat lover's daily diet.

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

customize.name: Glabrous Beans
customize.desc: A common legume in Teyvat with a light aroma. It can be prepared in a variety of ways, and is thus widely accepted by people all over the world.

customize.name: Marcotte
customize.desc: A pink flower with a pearl-like luster and rich scent profile. It is one of the most important ingredients in a perfumer's arsenal.

customize.name: Cassoulet
customize.desc: A simple countryside stew. Simply put all the ingredients in a casserole, mix them up, and cook until they are ready to serve. It is worth noting that the full name of this dish is "Glabrous Beans, Fowl Confit, and Smoked Sausage Stew in Cassoulet Casserole with a Side of Marcotte." The intimidating lengthiness of the name has, understandably, driven people to just call it "Cassoulet."

value.text: Purchase from Sanguinetti at Hotel Debord in Court of Fontaine
